hero.name: Emir Baycan
p: I build high-performance, scalable web apps, AI tools, and automation systems. Let's create the future together.

message.placeholder: What do you want to say?

about.content: I'm a full-stack developer, entrepreneur, and technology enthusiast. I build web/mobile apps, AI, and automation projects with experience in Python, C#, JavaScript, React, Angular, Node.js, Docker, and cloud. My goal is to create sustainable, scalable systems that make life easier through technology. Always learning, building, and innovating.

experience.p: What I have done so far

works.content: These projects showcase my real-world skills, from backend development to UI/UX, automation, and AI solutions. Check the links for source code and live demos.

alerts.success: Thank you. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
